name: Aurélien Lemesle
body: Hi, my name is Aurélien Lemesle _"O-ray-liːn Luh-may-luh"_, not really easy to pronunce I guess. I'm a french student in IT/computer science in [Epitech](http://www.epitech.eu/) (European Institute of Technology) based in Paris area. As part of my 5 years program (bachelor & master) with Epitech, I studied for one year IT & Management at [Jönköping University](http://hj.se/en.html) in Sweden. I'm a big fan of **Ruby** interpreted language but right now I really enjoy programming in **Objective-C** and playing with iOS. ## Education ### Epitech - European Institute of Technology IT Expert, Information Technology (2009 – 2014 expected). ### Jönköping University I was an exchange student for 2 semesters in Sweden and followed a master of Information Technology and Management in Jönköping tekniska högskolan (2012 – 2013). ## Experience ### iOS Software Engineer [@Airtag](http://airtag.com/) I'm currently taking part in the development of mobile shopping iPhone apps: [Diadiscount](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/diadiscount/id790280731?mt=8), [Coccishop](https://itunes.apple.com/us/app/coccishop/id819194884?mt=8). Improving and turning the user interface and experience of those applications in the iOS 7 trends. Technologies used : XCode 5, Interface Builder, HockeyApp. (Since November 2013) ### Ruby on Rails developer [@Reunik](http://reunik.com/) I participated in the development of a facebook web based application called [BestOfPhotos](http://www.bestofphotos.fr/) using different technologies such as Ruby on Rails, MongoDB, redis, Facebook Graph API, CoffeeScript, Haml/Sass. (May 2012 - August 2012) ### Web technologies Teaching Assistant [@Sup'internet](http://supinternet.fr/) Teaching Assistant for Sup'internet students in first year. Helping them learning about PHP, SQL, HTML, CSS. (September 2011 - July 2012) ### Ruby on Rails developer [@Custle](http://www.custle.com/) Backend Development of Ruby on Rails applications, configuring backend jobs and host files via Amazon Web Services. Technologies used : Ruby on Rails, CoffeeScript, Selenium web driver, AWS SDK for Ruby, Background job processing with gem Delayed_job. (December 2011 - April 2012) ### Web Developer at OXO communication Showcase and e-commerce websites development for a web agency based in Paris. Technologies used : PHP, JavaScript, HTML, CSS, Prestashop, Joomla. (July 2010 - December 2010) ## Skills * Objective-C * iOS * Ruby * Ruby on Rails * iPhone Application Development * Interface Builder * C * C++ ## Languages French is my native proficiency, I'm fluent in English and would be really interested to have an professional experience abroad. I also have a scholar level in Swedish and Spanish. ## Interests * Software development * Project Management * Agile Methods * New Technologies * Travelling ## Contact & links * Mail * Linkedin * Google+ * Follow me on Twitter * Mon CV en français (.pdf) * Zerply * Doyoubuzz * Skype me
